value.title: What the HECK is a Power BI Gateway Cluster?
value.excerpt: Confused about what a Power BI Gateway cluster is? Have your On-Premises Data Gateway installed but it's overloaded? This video is for you!  Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/data-integration/gateway/service-gateway-high-availability-clusters  PowerShell: https://docs.microsoft.com/data-integration/gateway/service-gateway-powershell-support

value.title: Age Calculation in Power BI using Power Query
value.excerpt: Power Query has a simple way of calculating the age. However, because DAX is the popular language in many calculations in Power BI, many are not aware of this function in Power Query. In this video, I am going to show you how easy is to calculate Age in Power BI using Power BI. This method is very useful

value.title: Aggregated Table in Power BI with Extra Options   Summarize Function in DAX
value.excerpt: In the previous video, I explained how you can use GROUPBY function in DAX to create an aggregated table. value.excerpt: Customer retention is one of the most common scenarios of data analysis, which is very useful for business.
